Description: Sherd (base). With inscription and 13-petalled rosette. Made of cobalt-black painted and green glazed pottery (buff).
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (pl.xxxix.g)
Gibbs 1994 / Mamluk Underglaze-Decorated Wares: Some Evidence from Fustat (fig.82)
